ValidationRule.description: A Finisar product cannot be created or modified if Source System = Oracle-EBS and Marketing_P_N__c, Status__c, OR ExternalId__c are null.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( TEXT(Source_System__c )= "Oracle-EBS" ,OR(Marketing_P_N__c = null, TEXT(Status__c ) = null, ExternalId__c = null))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Marketing P/N, Status, and External Id cannot be null
